document_data.name: Mayhap Lane
document_data.mainbody: The '''Hunt Bide''' was a short street in [[Suzail]], the capital of [[Cormyr]], that stretched from [[Promenade (Suzail)|the Promenade]] to [[Doloph Street]].
document_data.Description: The [[The Six Candles]] stood on the Hunt Bide's northern end that merged into Suzail's grand Promenade. From there, the Bide arched north as it moved west, passing [[Windever Street]] and ending on [[Doloph Street]], within an alleyway from the [[Trueshield Trading Priakos]] yards on Suzail's western city wall.
